pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, October 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Armenia, Nikol Pashinyan.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Turkey, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability. President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Dominic LeBlanc, Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Pablo Rodriguez, Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam, and Deputy Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Howard Njoo will be in attendance.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

Media appearance

5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CIME FM.
